s.text: Reservations are strongly recommended, particularly in summer and at Christmas.
As a basic guide, the symbols below have been used to indicate high-season rates in Hong Kong dollars, based on double occupancy, with bath or shower.
As a basic guide, the symbols below have been used to indicate high-season rates in Hong Kong dollars, based on double occupancy, with bath or shower.
A 10% service charge and 5% government tax will be added to the bill.
